mapper.select: SELECT MII.ITEM_ID, MII.ITEM_NAME, MII.ITEM_PRICE, MICI.ITEM_MAJOR_DIV, MJCI.ITEM_MAJOR_NAME, MICI.ITEM_MIDDLE_DIV, MDCI.ITEM_MIDDLE_NAME, MICI.ITEM_MINOR_DIV, MNCI.ITEM_MINOR_NAME, MIDI.ITEM_DISCOUNT_RATE FROM M_ITEM_INFO MII INNER JOIN M_ITEM_CLASS_INFO MICI ON MII.ITEM_ID = MICI.ITEM_ID LEFT JOIN M_ITEM_CLASS_MAJOR_INFO MJCI ON MICI.ITEM_MAJOR_DIV = MJCI.ITEM_MAJOR_DIV LEFT JOIN M_ITEM_CLASS_MIDDLE_INFO MDCI ON MICI.ITEM_MAJOR_DIV = MDCI.ITEM_MAJOR_DIV AND MICI.ITEM_MIDDLE_DIV = MDCI.ITEM_MIDDLE_DIV LEFT JOIN M_ITEM_CLASS_MINOR_INFO MNCI ON MNCI.ITEM_MAJOR_DIV = MICI.ITEM_MAJOR_DIV AND MNCI.ITEM_MIDDLE_DIV = MICI.ITEM_MIDDLE_DIV AND MNCI.ITEM_MINOR_DIV = MICI.ITEM_MINOR_DIV LEFT JOIN M_ITEM_DISCOUNT_INFO MIDI ON MIDI.ITEM_DISCOUNT_DIV = MII.ITEM_DISCOUNT_DIV WHERE MII.ITEM_NAME LIKE BINARY CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')

SELECT MII.ITEM_ID, MII.ITEM_NAME, MII.ITEM_PRICE, MICI.ITEM_MAJOR_DIV, MJCI.ITEM_MAJOR_NAME, MICI.ITEM_MIDDLE_DIV, MDCI.ITEM_MIDDLE_NAME, MICI.ITEM_MINOR_DIV, MNCI.ITEM_MINOR_NAME, MIDI.ITEM_DISCOUNT_RATE FROM M_ITEM_INFO MII INNER JOIN M_ITEM_CLASS_INFO MICI ON MII.ITEM_ID = MICI.ITEM_ID LEFT JOIN M_ITEM_CLASS_MAJOR_INFO MJCI ON MICI.ITEM_MAJOR_DIV = MJCI.ITEM_MAJOR_DIV LEFT JOIN M_ITEM_CLASS_MIDDLE_INFO MDCI ON MICI.ITEM_MAJOR_DIV = MDCI.ITEM_MAJOR_DIV AND MICI.ITEM_MIDDLE_DIV = MDCI.ITEM_MIDDLE_DIV LEFT JOIN M_ITEM_CLASS_MINOR_INFO MNCI ON MNCI.ITEM_MAJOR_DIV = MICI.ITEM_MAJOR_DIV AND MNCI.ITEM_MIDDLE_DIV = MICI.ITEM_MIDDLE_DIV AND MNCI.ITEM_MINOR_DIV = MICI.ITEM_MINOR_DIV LEFT JOIN M_ITEM_DISCOUNT_INFO MIDI ON MIDI.ITEM_DISCOUNT_DIV = MII.ITEM_DISCOUNT_DIV WHERE MII.ITEM_NAME_FOR_SEARCH LIKE BINARY CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
